title: rachael9385
author: rachael9385
created_time: August 03, 2023, 09:18:40 AMLast edit: September 24, 2023, 07:08:43 AM by rachael9385
content: The way fuel take dey cost for this our country just tire me well well, but I say make I update us on how to use cooking gas for our Generators, motors and motorcycle some of us never see am physically but some of us done see am maybe some persons dey use am already but as I never see this kind of thread here I say make I update my fellow Nigerians, the price of cooking gas dey somehow good but that one no be the main issue, the main thing here be say  COOKING GAS AND FUEL WHICH OF THEM THEY LAST PASS? So nah why I come with this update, if I buy 4.5kg of gass e go carry me from night till the morning for 3 day and some hours, so e go good if you check am out, no matter say I get solar sometimes way rain dey fall through out the day e no dey charge so I still dey buy cooking gas way I go use for my generator. (source).This one nah for people way dey use generatorThis cooking gas way we dey use for our Generators dey help us spend lesser, imagine say you buy ten (10) litters of fuel five thousand nine hundred and fifty naira (N5950) and the fuel no carry you till day break how you go feel? For my own side E go dey very very bad bro so na why our fellow Nigerians way sabi mechanical things bring this good idea come board so that our expenses go reduce small.This one nah for people way they use car for transportationAs for you way dey run transportation business how you go feel when you buy five (5) liters of fuel for your transport business then you never get the fuel money and the fuel way you buy con finish just like that? As for me e no go dey good, so nah why you go try this idea way our engineers carry come I know say e go dey some how but if we try am e go help us well well even some of us way no get motor e go help us because transportation go reduce small.This one nah for people way get motorcycleAs for motorcycle e fit no dey good sha but make we just try one of these thing e go help us reduce expenses.

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.body: I saw this online few days ago: https://www.legit.ng/people/1546480-woman-complains-generator-gulps-12kg-gas-7-hours-video-viral-tiktok/The woman complain about how gas consumption is more. Probably she may not be correct, or maybe she is correct.If there are people using cooking gas as genetor and car fuels, let us know please.For car and generator, what are the parts to be replaced before they are turned to gas consuming car or generator?As for me I still use PMS and public light.

comments.author: rachael9385
comments.body: Quote from: Charles-Tim on August 03, 2023, 10:46:44 AMI saw this online few days ago: https://www.legit.ng/people/1546480-woman-complains-generator-gulps-12kg-gas-7-hours-video-viral-tiktok/The woman complain about how gas consumption is more. Probably she may not be correct, or maybe she is correct.If there are people using cooking gas as genetor and car fuels, let us know please.For car and generator, what are the parts to be replaced before they are turned to gas consuming car or generator?As for me I still use PMS and public light.Yes me self I done hear one woman way dey complain about her own gas generator say e no dey last at all, but my own conclusions be say maybe her own no dey well constructed or the hose fit dey lick small small way she know know, if to say I nevet test am I for no talk positively about the gas generator but I done use am and one of my neighbor too won convert him own fuel generator to gas generator.For social media people self dey talk good about the gas generator,just watch this video to see or hear for your self.To convert fuel generator to gas generator e no dey hard at all nah just to buy your gas carburator then give any of this road side engineers way sabi the work, that's all.

comments.author: Makus
comments.created_time: August 03, 2023, 12:29:03 PMLast edit: August 03, 2023, 12:55:12 PM by Makus
comments.body: Quote from: Charles-Tim on August 03, 2023, 10:46:44 AMI saw this online few days ago: https://www.legit.ng/people/1546480-woman-complains-generator-gulps-12kg-gas-7-hours-video-viral-tiktok/The woman complain about how gas consumption is more. Probably she may not be correct, or maybe she is correct.If there are people using cooking gas as genetor and car fuels, let us know please.For car and generator, what are the parts to be replaced before they are turned to gas consuming car or generator?As for me I still use PMS and public light.I can't say the woman's complaint is wrong concerning the exhaustion of 12kg for 7 hours because it was based on her experience, but the truth is using an LPG for generation of electricity on a gasoline engine is more more economical when compared to the use of gasoline, with facts based on personal experience of the use of LPG in gasoline engine and information gathered by other users and mechanical engineers, I conclude that LPG is more economical when compared to the use of gasoline.this is my gasoline engine converted to a hybrid engine that can be switched between LPG and gasoline, comparing 1kg to 1liter respectively it's a 4:1 terms of hour.There are numerous possibility for her to experience the short period the 12kg was consumed, so I believe the retailer who refilled her gas must have done some fraudulent act in other to make more gain  or there is a leakage in her gas outlet.

comments.author: Odohu
comments.body: Quote from: Charles-Tim on August 03, 2023, 10:46:44 AMFor car and generator, what are the parts to be replaced before they are turned to gas consuming car or generator?The only part to replace to get this conversion is the fuel system... the carburetor and other minor accessories.  Quote from: Charles-Tim on August 03, 2023, 10:46:44 AMAs for me I still use PMS and public light.For a place with steady electricity supply like some places in Port Harcourt, this conversion is not really necessary. Personally, I have not spent more than N5,000 on fuel since February because we always have light. Quote from: rachael9385 on August 03, 2023, 11:56:07 AMFor social media people self dey talk good about the gas generator,just watch this video to see or hear for your self. The testimony is many. I learnt that 12.5kg that cost around N9,000 can last for about 90 hours, equivalent of over 3 days non stop.

comments.author: Timmzzy
comments.body: me i never still take part in this aspect of conversion of fuel to gas, menhn hope say we all know the risk wey follow am, or we just dey follow do weytin them dey show us. my brother i no go lie you fear still dey my body and why i never dey moved na cause i dey use car wey no dey consume fuel much and also where i dey base we dey get power on a normal.

comments.author: rachael9385
comments.body: Quote from: Timmzzy on August 03, 2023, 03:18:56 PMme i never still take part in this aspect of conversion of fuel to gas, menhn hope say we all know the risk wey follow am, or we just dey follow do weytin them dey show us. my brother i no go lie you fear still dey my body and why i never dey moved na cause i dey use car wey no dey consume fuel much and also where i dey base we dey get power on a normal.Hhm hm bro everything way we dey do nah risk we dey take, comon to sleep nah risk, travelling nah risk and even investment too nah risk, so bro that one no be excuse, I know say that one nah your own opinion but if i go ask you one thing, how many people way you done hear say house burn? If you done hear any please tell us and don't forget to give us prove.Oyibo people don already do trucks and cars way dey use raw gas and now our fellow Nigerian engineers con share their own idea on how to manage now we they get second thought to use am because of fear. This nah the thing Oyibo people do way dey use has incase you know know https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_natural_gas_vehicles

comments.author: Stable090
comments.body: Quote from: rachael9385 on August 03, 2023, 09:18:40 AM COOKING GAS AND FUEL WHICH OF THEM THEY LAST PASS? I never convert my own generator into gas, but I sabi wey don convert am already, and according to them gas dey economical pass petrol by far, and as we can see gas price dey drop now for some places now gas na around #500 and I hear say d rate at which gas dey burn dey low pass petrol own. Wetin come even make me believe them be say plenty people don dey convert their generator to gas and if e no dey last, then people for no dey rush am like that.Quote from: rachael9385 on August 03, 2023, 09:18:40 AMSo nah why I come with this update, if I buy 4.5kg of gass e go carry me from night till the morning for 3 day and some hours, so e go good if you check am out,E dey very okay be that now, I no sabi d kin generator wey u dey use and I no sabi d kin load wey u dey use ur generator carry, but if we wan on generator overnight now, na only God d amount wey d person go dey spend daily on petrol most especially if na big generator d person dey use, but from ur analysis now, then gas better pass petrol.Quote from: rachael9385 on August 03, 2023, 09:18:40 AMThis one nah for people way they use car for transportationI fit use dis car own also even as I know say e dey kind of risk pass that generator own but I no fit even try bike own. If the gas dey inside car i see say e go dey shake, if sun too much and d gas wey dey d cylinder don too shake anything fit happen now, but I no fit every try bike own and I no fit climb any bike wey use am, bike wey dey easily fall, if d gas don too shake and maybe accident happen d gas fit explode immediately now, na double accident be that ooo. If d bike accident no kill those people, maybe na d gas explosion go kill them.

comments.author: Adams0001
comments.body: Quote from: Stable090 on August 03, 2023, 07:55:42 PMI fit use dis car own also even as I know say e dey kind of risk pass that generator own but I no fit even try bike own. If the gas dey inside car i see say e go dey shake, if sun too much and d gas wey dey d cylinder don too shake anything fit happen now, but I no fit every try bike own and I no fit climb any bike wey use am, bike wey dey easily fall, if d gas don too shake and maybe accident happen d gas fit explode immediately now, na double accident be that ooo. If d bike accident no kill those people, maybe na d gas explosion go kill them.This matter no be small thing ooh this cooking gas no be small infect he be ooh gas and generator, he better for me make i just dey use my fuel for gen,Gas dangerous pass petrol, but i never see this can thing before, na my first time be this seeing cooking Gas that yiu can use it to operate generator and bikes this technology just dey express this everyday, i think fuel go last pass gas, because load where fuel fit carry gas no fit  carry am because na like Air him be. For me i no fit tell person make him use this cooking gas for gen or car because the thing get many disadvantage i dey fear am Weller.

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: I have seen this and from the reviews of many Nigerians I think this conversation have a positive result and considering the earlier fear that the conversion from fuel to gas usage may cause engine problem but to this extent there have not been any report of an increase in engine break down due to the conversion and knowing that, both fuel and gas could run on the same engine concurrently is what make this development more interesting. I have a friend who already converted his generator from fuel to gas and the capurator run I both fuel and gas and he prefer using gas to power the generators he says it burns slowly compared to fuel and also the gas price is relatively low and since using gas against PMS gives him 3 hours extra power in a 6kg gas compared to 6 litters of fuel time usage. So in all senses this new invention pay more than the fuel we were used to considering the recent increase in the price of fuel in Nigeria due to the fuel subsidy removal. But the challenges with this new converter is it availability like in my region there is no single conversion centre for those who want to install this equipment in their automobile they will have to travel to neighbouring States and the demand is high so you need to book ahead of time. And also recently the price of the generator mono caprator has skyrocketed due to higher demands, so the unavailability of this tool may force its price to increase and that could be a big drawback to many who may be considering this new invention.

comments.author: DaNNy001
comments.body: Omo this trend na watin dey currently happen for my area o because this country don totally frustrate people life and as this new government don enter e come be like say the matter don cum worst so many people don device other lucrative way to tackle the high price of petrol. I don know what is happening in the nation but people don actually care again they will do anything that will make them survive as that sef na the number one thing wey humans dey good at.

comments.author: Zanab247
comments.body: Quote from: rachael9385The way fuel take dey cost for this our country just tire me well well, but I say make I update us on how to use cooking gas for our Generators, motors and motorcycle some of us never see am physically but some of us done see am maybe some persons dey use am already but as I never see this kind of thread here I say make I update my fellow Nigerians, the price of cooking gas dey somehow good but that one no be the main issue, the main thing here be say  COOKING GAS AND FUEL WHICH OF THEM THEY LAST PASS? I will not advice bitcoiners to embark on this new strategy people are using to sustain their lives, because if they can carry out their personal research to know, the high risk involved in this system of using gas for generator, motorcycle and motors they will avoid it in the society. The first day I saw this new system online of using gas to replace fuel in generator, motorcycle and motors, made me to feel bad for what will happen to some people who will embark on it just because of high price of fuel in our nation Nigeria. Yes, using gas to on your generator can reduce the cost of your spending in the area of fuel but it can cause a damage that you will never recover from and likewise motorcycle and motors too, please let us not join them to use all those things to replace the function of fuel.

comments.author: Perfectbaby
comments.body: Omo this one no be wetin person go involved themselves oo, because this thing dey very risky and can take lives at any point, instead e go better say you manage your life gently than trying to go risk it for just peanut of 650 naira. As a matter to know, i don't see why some people can't afford to pay for 1 litre of fuel to go risk their lives that is worth more than 1 littr of fuel.

comments.author: Obari
comments.body: I believe say this very methods na for people wey no dey rely consume light and I believe  say you no go allow or advice person wey dey run laundry to adapt to this very method because we all know say the higher the inflammability, the higher the rate of consumption of the fuel and we all also know that gasoline is very much inflammable than petrol.I no go lie,  I no really go through  this your post but I don already conclude say na the follow follow mentality  wey we get na e dey worry us right from time and  if we really take time analyze this whole thing, considering the cost of gas, you go understand  say e no dey efficient and e fit also lead to hike in fuel price as the demand might now be greater than the supply.

comments.author: RahimNda
comments.body: Oboy, this gas-related stuff will be really risky for someone to do. From what I can tell, it even has the potential to badly endanger lives, therefore it's best to find an alternative or to live a somewhat normal existence under any difficult circumstances. Given the size of the country, I believe that there are times or days when things would be better. We should have supplies for everything, including gasoline, diesel, and other fuels, but I also believe that gas should have advantages of its own.

comments.author: Gozie51
comments.body: The talk wey I get to yarn about this gas generator stuff be say e still dey look risky for me. I never get moral to even stay where Dem dey use am not to talk of using it. My question be say wetin be the level of savings wey person fit get from dat because if we dey follow people dey do something, we suppose also dey check the gains and loss. Now somebody wey no dey use him generator for business, meaning say your level of fuel consumption fit no dey high like you dey use am time to time, you suppose know how much you dey save whether e worth am to go start using the gas. If business people decide to use am base on say Dem dey safe money from am, Dem fit get point but no be for low consumer of fuel to begin stress their self on d thing.And one big question be say, hmmm what if this government go increase the price of gas?   Because nothing dey stable for Nigerian governance.

comments.author: DaNNy001
comments.body: Quote from: RahimNda on August 07, 2023, 11:47:28 AMOboy, this gas-related stuff will be really risky for someone to do. From what I can tell, it even has the potential to badly endanger lives, therefore it's best to find an alternative or to live a somewhat normal existence under any difficult circumstances. Given the size of the country, I believe that there are times or days when things would be better. We should have supplies for everything, including gasoline, diesel, and other fuels, but I also believe that gas should have advantages of its own.With what I have seen so far with this new development I don't see any risk that have evolved with all the stores and people using it. We currently install our own gas carburetor to our generator and I must say the thing dey work really fine and it's even environmental friendly I think because the actual flame thats coming out from the generator is white instead of the usual black carbon monoxide that's explode out from using fuel in the generator.

comments.author: Stable090
comments.body: Quote from: RahimNda on August 07, 2023, 11:47:28 AMOboy, this gas-related stuff will be really risky for someone to do. From what I can tell, it even has the potential to badly endanger lives, Abeg I go like make you enlighten us more about the risk wey dey and how e go take endanger our lives, because I know say everything wey we dey use get risk, how many times you go hear say smoke wey dey commot for generator dey enter room and e dey kill people, so even petrol dey risky be that, I know come know the risk wey dey make u dey use gas for generator ooo, I know say nothing dey perfect but I sabi people wey dey use generator and I never hear any casualties, all of them dey even talk say e make sense pass make u dey use petrol, but if u go fit talk about d risk, at-least we are all here to learn. Quote from: RahimNda on August 07, 2023, 11:47:28 AMtherefore it's best to find an alternative or to live a somewhat normal existence under any difficult circumstances. The easiest alternative wey I know na solar, and as we can see no be everybody get money do solar, some people wey don get generator before no get money wey dem go commot at once go do solar, we all know what’s going on in d country now, we see say everything hard now, we just dey try rugged am.

comments.author: Mr.suevie
comments.body: Quote from: Stable090 on August 08, 2023, 10:51:35 PMQuote from: RahimNda on August 07, 2023, 11:47:28 AMOboy, this gas-related stuff will be really risky for someone to do. From what I can tell, it even has the potential to badly endanger lives, Abeg I go like make you enlighten us more about the risk wey dey and how e go take endanger our lives, because I know say everything wey we dey use get risk, how many times you go hear say smoke wey dey commot for generator dey enter room and e dey kill people, so even petrol dey risky be that, I know come know the risk wey dey make u dey use gas for generator ooo, I know say nothing dey perfect but I sabi people wey dey use generator and I never hear any casualties, all of them dey even talk say e make sense pass make u dey use petrol, but if u go fit talk about d risk, at-least we are all here to learn. Quote from: RahimNda on August 07, 2023, 11:47:28 AMtherefore it's best to find an alternative or to live a somewhat normal existence under any difficult circumstances. The easiest alternative wey I know na solar, and as we can see no be everybody get money do solar, some people wey don get generator before no get money wey dem go commot at once go do solar, we all know what’s going on in d country now, we see say everything hard now, we just dey try rugged am. Solar sef na another fine alternative oo but as e be the cost of acquiring a solar panel and battery wey go carry the whole appliances for your house sef na another wahaha especially when it's come to pumping of water because you go need to purchase big power solar  wey fit cost you millions of naira before you achieved this goal.

comments.author: knowngunman
comments.body: You try for bringing this to our attention but I go like advice you to include the link of where you carry the idea from next time make dem no drag you for plagiarism. This pictures and the content no be your own but base on say na we we na my kobo wey I get to borrow you be that as a brother concern. I remember reading one thread wey Agbe was drag for using ATM picture attached to one of his post as his experience at bank. The same go happen to you if na larger board. Make we all dey careful abeg.Back to discussion, our people na one kind wey no dey care about precautions and safety. Gas no be like petrol ooo e dey very hazardous and flammable with little temper. And besides no be anyhow engineer go fix am if not na direct explosion as you start the engine. The idea is easier in theory but very complicated in practice.
